item.title: fluentd plugins for Microsoft Azure Services
item.description: UPDATED: 2016-12-10: Added fluent-plugin-azure-loganalytics to the list 2016-11-23: Added fluent-plugin-azurefunctions to the list Here is a list of fluentd plugins for Microsoft Azure Services. Plugin Name Target Azure Services Note fluent-plugin-azurestorage Blob Storage Azure Storate output plugin buffers logs in local file and upload them to Azure Storage periodicall fluent-plugin-azureeventhubs Event Hubs Azure Event Hubs buffered output plugin for Fluentd.
